name: Ganesh Polymers
overview:
Established in the year 1977 we, “Shree Ganesh Polymers” are a prominent organization engaged in manufacturing, supplying, wholesaling, distribution, trading and exporting Hoses, PVC Material and Conveyor Belts.

Our Products: Pressure Hose Pipe Rubber Hose Pipe Nylon Braided Hose Pipes HDPE Ducts HDPE Pipes PVC Material PVC Tubings PVC Garden Hose PVC Suction Hose Conveyor Belts

Our Team: With the unwavering support of our team, we have been able to established strong foot hold in this industry. Professionals associated with us fulfill responsibility of production and managerial in the most promising manner.

Infrastructure: We hold a sound and sprawling infrastructure setup at Narela, (New Delhi, India). To ensure hassle-free execution of production process, we have thoughtfully segregated this setup in different units. Installed with latest machinery and utilities, these units are manned by diligent and well-versed personnel.

Quality Assurance: We make constant effort in order to present our clients with the best-in-class range of Hoses, PVC Material and Conveyor Belts.

Clients Satisfaction: All our efforts are concentrated towards maximizing contentment level of our esteemed clients. We make constant efforts to provide our clients with the finest products. Manufactured using supreme quality basic material, the offered range conforms to the defined parameters of the industry.
